name: SnackAttack!
description:
SnackAttack! is a free-to-play twin-stick arcade shoot-em-up game for Android.

Use a variety of food-themed weapons and blast your way through various levels filled with enemy vermin!

This game is currently a student project but may receive further updates, including additional weapons, characters and levels.

Director / Concept Artist / Lead Game Designer / Level Builder / Level Designer / Programmer - Sonny Yang

Lead Programmer - Alex Bryans

Lead Artist / Concept Artist / Animator / Programmer - Bill Lau

Level Designer / UI Designer / Graphic Designer - Anthony Nguyen

Production Manager / QA Tester / Programmer / Colourist - Alistair Bartlett

Music Composer - Niam Mepani

Sound Designer - Ben Kezic

Sound Designer - Joseph Knowles

Supervising Animator / Pre-Vis Artist - Alyssa Gomes

Graphic Illustrator - Kiarra Pearce

Graphic Colourist - Joel Dunn

Special thanks to Karl Pytte and Mark Thompson, without whom this game would not be possible.
